channel.title: Engineering-Management on Ben Selby
channel.description: Recent content in Engineering-Management on Ben Selby

item.title: Technical Roadmaps and Dev Sustainability
item.description: At a high level, most engineers are working on product backlogs, in some way, shape, or form. What happens if that product backlog dries up? Or, as a manager or leader, you need to fill a period of uncertainty? This post is going to take you on my journey over the years, and put forward a solution that can be applied to small projects, large projects, and even at an organisational unit level.
